title: Foam Roller Chest Opener Stretch
description: Place a foam roller on a padded surface. Sit in front of the roller with your back to it. Carefully position yourself at the bottom of the foam roller and slowly lie back. Once your spine has been laid out the length of the roller, bring your feet in towards the bottom. Extend your arms to the sides. You will feel your chest open and stretch. If you feel comfortable enough, move the foam roller under you slowly from side to side.
